data.message:
Yelawolf inspired freestyle lol.......

Grown up without a father who lives off a Budweiser//I always knew when I grew up I would be a bit wiser//Be there for my kids I'll always be here yep I am a lifer//Then sometimes I think of you get mad and its hard to decipher//Between the man Im "supposed" to be and the man I've become//Guess its true what they say behind every great man is a great MOM//She's all I need, and your gone now dont you feel dumb//I would call you an asshole but she taught me respect, so your just a "BUM"!!
